task.summary: Initial import. This pattern matcher extracts variable names and literals from semi-structured text with syntax "${a}literal${b}".
Add the ability to match operators as well as variables. Fix a problem where the last literal was not extracted.
Draft support to assemble a command execution plan. Needs testing.
